articles.author: Charles Rollet
articles.title: Exclusive: Google’s Gemini is forcing contractors to rate AI responses outside their expertise - TechCrunch
articles.description: Internal guidelines passed down from Google led to concerns that the AI model could be prone to inaccurate outputs on topics like healthcare.
articles.content: Generative AI may look like magic, but behind the development of these systems are armies of employees at companies like Google, OpenAI, and others, known as “prompt engineers” and analysts, who rate… [+2143 chars]

articles.author: Shannon Osaka
articles.title: Microplastics may be leading to lung and colon cancer, study shows - The Washington Post
articles.description: New research published Wednesday in the journal Environmental Science and Technology offers evidence that microplastics are harming human health.
articles.content:
When a car rolls down a freeway, a fine spray of microplastics spews out from its tires. When you wash your clothes, millions of tiny synthetic microfibers spill into waterways.
And those tiny piece… [+4738 chars]
